item.title: add-padding-around-string
item.description: text = 'Chapter 2' Add Padding Around Text # Add Spaces Of Padding To The Left format(text, '>20') ' Chapter 2' # Add Spaces Of Padding To The Right format(text, '<20') 'Chapter 2 ' # Add Spaces Of Padding On Each Side format(text, '^20') ' Chapter 2 ' # Add * Of Padding On Each Side format(text, '*^20') '*****Chapter 2******'

item.title: age-calculator
item.description: from datetime import datetime def get_age(d): d1 = datetime.now() months = (d1.year - d.year) * 12 + d1.month - d.month year = int(months / 12) return year age = get_age(datetime(1991, 1, 1)) age 31

item.title: basic
item.description: print("basic") Failed to start the Kernel. Kernel tar (Python 3.10.0) is not usable. Check the Jupyter output tab for more information. View Jupyter <a href='command:jupyter.viewOutput'>log</a> for further details.
